name: Visibility
description: `Form.Visibility` makes it possible to hide components and elements on the screen based on the dynamic state of data.

props.name: visibleWhen
props.doc:
Provide a `path` or `itemPath`, and a `hasValue` function that returns either a boolean or the expected value to determine whether the children should be shown. The first parameter passed to `hasValue` is the value at the given `path`. If the `path` does not exist, the value will be `undefined`. 
Alternatively, you can use `isValid` instead of `hasValue` to show the children only when the field has no validation errors and has been blurred (lost focus). You can change this behavior by setting the `validateContinuously` property.

props.name: visibleWhenNot
props.doc: Same as `visibleWhen`, but with inverted logic.

props.name: pathDefined
props.doc: Given data context path must be defined to show children.

props.name: pathUndefined
props.doc: Given data context path must be undefined to show children.

props.name: pathTruthy
props.doc: Given data context path must be truthy to show children.

props.name: pathFalsy
props.doc: Given data context path must be falsy to show children.

props.name: pathTrue
props.doc: Given data context path must be true to show children.

props.name: pathFalse
props.doc: Given data context path must be false to show children.

props.name: inferData
props.doc: Will be called to decide by external logic, and show/hide contents based on the return value.

props.name: visible
props.doc: Control visibility directly using the `visible` prop. When used alongside other conditions, the `visible` prop takes precedence.

props.name: animate
props.doc: Define if the content should animate during show/hide.

props.name: keepInDOM
props.doc: Keep the content in the DOM, even if it's not visible. Can be used to let fields run validation.

props.name: compensateForGap
props.doc: To compensate for CSS gap between the rows, so animation does not jump during the animation. Provide a CSS unit or `auto`. Defaults to `null`.

props.name: filterData
props.doc: Filter data based on provided criteria. More info about `filterData` can be found in the [Getting Started](/uilib/extensions/forms/getting-started/#filter-data) documentation.

props.name: fieldPropsWhenHidden
props.doc: When visibility is hidden, and `keepInDOM` is true, pass these props to the children.

props.name: element
props.doc: Define the type of element. Defaults to `div`. Only for when `animate` is true.

events.name: onVisible
events.doc: Callback for when the content gets visible. Returns a boolean as the first parameter.

events.name: onAnimationEnd
events.doc: Is called when animation is done and the full height is reached. The first parameter is a string. Depending on the state, the value can be `opened`, `closed` or `adjusted`.
